response.overview: Erdal and Aleyna have an accident while intoxicated. Frightened, Erdal and Aleyna decide to run away with their friends Volkan and Cansu. Encountering Naz, whose car broke down on the way while escaping from the police, the group takes the young woman with them. Thinking that they left everything behind by running away, what the group did not take into account is that the husband of the woman who died in the accident was a genie named Ervah. Ervah enters the minds of those who caused the accident, directs them and makes them come to his own house.
response.title: Zehirli Tohumlar: Ölüm Yolu
